participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake is eager to experience life outside his parents' home.
participant_1.background: i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i just want to have fun with my friends.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Lila finds joy in simple pleasures and enjoys expressing herself through art.
participant_2.background: i enjoy coloring books. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. my husband is adopted.

content.text: do you like dogs? because i have a german shepherd dog
but i enjoy coloring books with pushkin's lyrics
that's all because of me living in a rural farming community for months
